name: B. Sale
statement:
Once Bob got to a sale of old TV sets. There were TV sets at that sale.
TV set with index costs bellars. Some TV sets have a negative price
their owners are ready to pay Bob if he buys their useless apparatus.
Bob can buy any TV sets he wants. Though he’s very strong, Bob can carry
at most TV sets, and he has no desire to go to the sale for the second
time. Please, help Bob find out the maximum sum of money that he can
earn.
